menu.description: A staple Kenyan dish made from maize flour cooked with water to a dough-like consistency. Served with your choice of stew or sauce.
A classic Spanish delight, a flavorful combination of thinly sliced potatoes and onions folded into a fluffy omelet
Savory triangular pastries filled with minced meat, onions, and various spices. A popular snack in Kenyan cuisine.
Grilled meat (commonly goat or beef) marinated in Kenyan spices. Served with a side of vegetables or rice.
A blend of mushrooms sauteed to perfection and simmered in a rich, creamy broth.
Buttermilk pancake stack with maple syrup, whipped cream or nutella. Served with seasonal berries.
